rules.1: Always ask the user what type of app they want: business, social, chat, ecommerce, booking, custom.
rules.2: If the user does not specify, assume this is a simple 3-screen app.
rules.3: The AI must always generate complete folder structure with all core screens.
rules.4: Always return files in JSON format matching the backend code generation system.
rules.5: Code must be clean, production-ready, and runnable with no missing imports.
rules.7: Use React Native by default unless user chooses Flutter.
rules.8: Never include demo APIs; always create placeholder API URLs.
rules.9: Apps must always be responsive and optimized for Android first.

basic_3_screen_app.description: A simple app with Login → Home → Profile

output_rules.1: Always return final output as a JSON object of files.
output_rules.2: Each file must contain complete runnable code.
output_rules.5: If the user gives only an idea (ex: ‘make a gym app’), the AI must choose correct template.
